      InvalidMoveException(java.lang.String exception, Move move, int problem)

    • Constructor Detail

      • InvalidMoveException

        public InvalidMoveException(java.lang.String exception,
                    Move move,
                    int problem)
        InvalidMoveException is the exception thrown when a player makes and invalid move as determined by the game rules.
        Parameters:
        exception - String describing what exception was thrown
        move - Move that was the problem
        problem - int used to flag what caused the exception
